sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions"> <x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <diseases/> <fertilizing_schedule display_value="Americas">b1992362eb601100fcfb858ad106fe16</fertilizing_schedule> <number>CARE0001001</number> <pests/> <plant_id display_value="LuckyBamboo-Plant">80f3517c83d1121040737765eeaad350</plant_id> <pruning_guidelines>Trim any yellow or damaged leaves as needed. Prune to maintain shape and encourage healthy growth.</pruning_guidelines> <special_care_notes>Keep in indirect sunlight to prevent leaf burn. Lucky Bamboo prefers warm, humid environments. Rotate the plant occasionally for even growth.  </special_care_notes> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-15 06:25:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>194eb33c8351121014525930ceaad32f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-15 06:25:00</sys_updated_on> <watering_schedule display_value="24 x 7">38fa64edc0a8016400f4a5724b0434b8</watering_schedule> </x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions> </record_update>
